name: Colin McRae Rally 2.0
description:
Colin McRae Rally 2.0 is a simulation, racing and arcade game developed by Codemasters and Spellbound Entertainment. It came out on 01-12-2000. It was published by Codemasters. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Colin McRae Rally 2.0 on Game Boy Advance, PlayStation and PC.
Allister Brimble scored the game.
